segments.text: I see the woman standing by the sink, drying dishes like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems completely unaware of the water overflowing and creating a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice her foot is already in the puddle of water on the floor, but she doesn't care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit frustrated watching her, wishing she would just turn around and see what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children behind her are being so sneaky, taking cookies without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy standing on a stool, reaching for the cookie jar, and it looks like he's about to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't hurt himself while she's not paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why she's not more aware of her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just making me feel a bit irritated.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone intervenes before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR
